attributes.action: Tell the banks to allow customers to switch to interest only mortgage.
attributes.additional_details: Make changes as highlighted to avoid millions of people going in bad credit and eventually loose thier homes
attributes.background: To force the banks through legistration to switch affected customers interest only as alternative to payment holidays and another type of payment plan which only helps out temporarily .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual lenders.
